additionalFields.heading: WS103
additionalFields.title: Boost Developer Productivity with Amazon Q Developer (repeat)
additionalFields.body: Sizwe Molefe, Solutions Architect, AWS | Abulele Mditshwa, Solutions Architect, AWS
additionalFields.bodyBack: Discover how AI-powered automation and intelligent code assistance can reduce friction, speed up development cycles, and improve code quality. Explore real-world use cases like AI-driven code reviews, automated testing, and smart documentation generation. Learn how to seamlessly integrate these tools into your workflows to boost efficiency, enhance collaboration, and elevate the developer experience—all while ensuring security and compliance. You will need a laptop to participate.

additionalFields.heading: BIZ102
additionalFields.title: Fleet Tracking at Scale: Building for 4M Daily Transactions
additionalFields.body: Jason Nicholls, Principal Solutions Architect, AWS | Danie Du Plessis, Lead Solutions Architect, FuseIT
additionalFields.bodyBack: Journey into the architecture and engineering decisions behind a high-performance system processing over 4 million transactions daily. This session reveals how we collaborated with the AWS Location Services team to architect a robust, enterprise-grade vehicle and asset tracking solution that seamlessly scales with demand. Discover the challenges we overcame, the critical design patterns we implemented, and how we leveraged AWS's location-based services to deliver real-time tracking at massive scale.

additionalFields.heading: DAT105
additionalFields.title: Apache Iceberg and what it means for Analytics
additionalFields.body: Felix Munyoki, Operations Manager, AWS | Raamy Schroeder, Engineer Mgr, Cloud: ITS Data Engineering, Woolworths
additionalFields.bodyBack: Woolworths migrated their analytics infrastructure from HUDI to Apache Iceberg, integrating it into their Enterprise Data Lake (EDL). The implementation leverages AWS Glue for processing, S3 for storage, and Redshift for user interactions. This session explores how Apache Iceberg's table format enhances analytics capabilities, improves data management, and enables better performance for large-scale data operations in modern cloud architectures.

additionalFields.heading: NET101
additionalFields.title: Patterns for PrivateLink and VPC Lattice for Hybrid Networks
additionalFields.body: Kaveer Harie, Senior Solutions Architect, AWS
additionalFields.bodyBack: Amazon VPC Lattice is an application networking service that simplifies connecting, securing, and monitoring service-to-service communication. You can use VPC Lattice to facilitate cross-account and cross-VPC connectivity, as well as application layer load balancing for your workloads in a consistent way regardless of the underlying compute type—instances, containers, and serverless. In this session, get a general overview of VPC Lattice, learn about the latest features and functionality, discover pro tips and tricks to adopt best practices, and explore top architecture patterns organizations use to simplify application connectivity, security, and load balancing.

additionalFields.heading: OIS103
additionalFields.title: Fireside Chat - Supercharge your innovation: Automate for operational excellence
additionalFields.body: Terrence Naidoo, SSA SA Lead, Solution Architecture Manager, AWS | Cobus Frey, Group Product Owner – Global Cloud
additionalFields.bodyBack: Join us for a fireside chat as we explore how enterprises can truly thrive in their cloud journey with AWS. Our speaker will share candid insights from their own transformation story, revealing how they've woven together their teams, workflows, and technology to create a culture of automation excellence. Through casual conversation, we'll unpack real-world examples of how Tyme Bank tackled operational challenges, drives innovation, and stays ahead in today's competitive landscape. Come ready to hear practical strategies and honest lessons learned as we discuss the art of automating effectively, making smart prioritization decisions, and fostering collaboration across teams. This relaxed, interactive format offers a unique opportunity to learn from Tyme Banks hands-on experience in platform operations and engineering."

additionalFields.heading: PTN117
additionalFields.title: From Months to Minutes: Streamline Vendor Compliance with Blink
additionalFields.body: Trevor Naidoo
additionalFields.bodyBack: Vendor compliance is often slow, fragmented, and manual. In this session, explore how Blink—a cloud-based vendor management system—helps organizations reduce onboarding timelines from months to minutes. Learn how Blink centralizes supplier data, automates compliance tracking, and supports real-time reporting to meet supply chain, B-BBEE, and sustainability goals.

additionalFields.heading: COM105
additionalFields.title: Building Resilient Microservices with Go, Kubernetes, and AWS
additionalFields.body: Oluwagbenga Fagbola, Software Engineer Full-Stack/SRE, EvonMedics LLC
additionalFields.bodyBack: Explore real-world strategies for building resilient, scalable microservices using Go, Kubernetes, and AWS. This session covers infrastructure automation with Terraform, CI/CD, and observability with Prometheus and CloudWatch to minimize downtime. Drawing from production SRE experience, including ECS to EKS migrations, we'll unpack service mesh integrations and Go-powered tooling for reliability. Learn actionable insights on system design, performance tuning, and creating self-healing, production-grade systems for modern cloud-native applications.

additionalFields.heading: NET103
additionalFields.title: Centralized Inspection at scale: Cloud WAN vs Transit Gateway
additionalFields.body: Joseph Mutua, Sr. Solutions Architect, AWS
additionalFields.bodyBack: AWS Centralized Inspection at scale is essentially a security architecture pattern that lets you inspect all your network traffic through a single, centralized location instead of setting up security tools in each individual network. In this session, we will see how to setup Centralized Inspection at scale with Cloud WAN, and Transit Gateway, differences between the two, and benefits

additionalFields.heading: CH1106
additionalFields.title: Mastering AWS Landing Zones: Zero to Hero
additionalFields.body: Kennedy Masunda, Technical Account Manager, AWS | Shantal Varathan, Technical Account Manager, AWS
additionalFields.bodyBack: Unleash the full potential of AWS Control Tower in your cloud journey! Discover powerful strategies for automated account provisioning, custom landing zones, and intelligent guardrails. Learn how to create a dynamic governance framework that grows with your business by integrating Control Tower, Organizations, and Config. Perfect for those ready to take their AWS environment to the next level.

additionalFields.heading: STU100
additionalFields.title: Introduction to Generative AI
additionalFields.body: Nqobile Immaculate Qwabe, AWS
additionalFields.bodyBack: You'll learn about one of the hottest topics in the world of data science, generative AI. This session helps you to understand the technologies that make generative AI possible. You will be introduced to Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning (ML), and generative AI. The session concludes with a hands on PartyRock demo

additionalFields.heading: PTN202
additionalFields.title: Supercharge Your Amazon EKS: Unlock Efficiency, Security and Cost Savings with SUSE Rancher Prime
additionalFields.body: Dawid van der Merwe, Solution Architect, SUSE
additionalFields.bodyBack: The Road Accident Fund (RAF) made a strategic decision to reduce operational and administrative costs while improving claims settlement efficiency through digitization. Their focus on system modernization includes: Implementing an integrated claims management system, Digitizing processes and Enhancing cybersecurity. RAF selected AWS as a key strategic partner to drive their desired outcomes, which among others include focusing settling claims within 120 days.

additionalFields.heading: DAT107
additionalFields.title: Build your data strategy for generative AI with Amazon Redshift
additionalFields.body: Syed Humair, Sr. Analytics Specialist Solutions Architect, AWS
additionalFields.bodyBack: Data warehouses are crucial for generative AI development. Amazon Redshift's domain data enables RAG, fine-tuning foundation models, continuous pretraining, and building new models. Users can leverage built-in AI features like Amazon Q to generate SQL code using natural language in the Redshift query editor, boosting productivity and accelerating insights. Learn how to harness Amazon Redshift for your generative AI applications and workloads.

additionalFields.heading: PTN112
additionalFields.title: Your Next User Isn’t Human: Agentic AI in Action
additionalFields.body: Kieron Ekron
additionalFields.bodyBack: Agentic AI shifts the paradigm, and autonomous systems now act as users, collaborators, and decision-makers. This session explores practical architectures, emerging design patterns, and the implications of treating AI agents as first-class users across AWS services. Learn how to build for a world where your next user might be an AI.

additionalFields.heading: COM306
additionalFields.title: Supercharge DevOps Automation with Amazon Bedrock and Go
additionalFields.body: Rasheed Mudasiru, Web & Cloud Developer, Bamboo Charcoal Computing
additionalFields.bodyBack: In this talk, we go through how we can bring AI into our DevOps workflows using Amazon Bedrock and Go. A walk through practical examples of how Bedrock’s foundation models can help us automate things like interpreting designs, troubleshooting, log analysis, and even building smart tools to handle repetitive tasks. We will also look at how you can plug Bedrock into your different DevOps pipelines to make them more intelligent and efficient. If you are a DevOps engineer or Go developer looking to level up your automation with AI without getting deep into machine learning, this session will give you hands-on ideas and code to get started right away.

additionalFields.heading: PTR107
additionalFields.title: Modernize to Monetize: Powering innovation with FutureReady AI & Cloud
additionalFields.body: Khomotso Molabe, Group CIO, Personal and Private Wealth, Standard Bank South Africa | Gaurav Syal, Business Strategist & Head of AWS Cloud Business EMEA, Tata Consultancy Services
additionalFields.bodyBack: The concept of "Modernize to Monetize" emphasizes the necessity for businesses to transition from legacy systems to cloud platforms, enabling real-time decision-making and efficiency. Successful modernization requires not just tech upgrades but also change management and partnerships to address the challenges. Our panel will share the trends, challenges, guardrails and how it being addressed.

additionalFields.heading: AIM104
additionalFields.title: Accelerate ML workflows with Amazon SageMaker Studio and Sanlam
additionalFields.body: Craig Mullins, Solutions Architect, AWS | Vedanth Baiju, Head of Data Science, Sanlam | Harry Lee, Co-Founder and CTO, Melio.ai
additionalFields.bodyBack: Unlock the power of Amazon SageMaker Studio, a comprehensive IDE for streamlining the machine learning (ML) lifecycle. Explore data exploration, transformation, automated feature engineering with AutoML, and collaborative coding using integrated Jupyter Notebooks. Discover how SageMaker Studio MLOps integration simplifies model deployment, monitoring, and governance. Through live demos and best practices, learn to leverage SageMaker Studio tools for efficient feature engineering, model development, collaboration, and data security. Learn how Sanlam, a major African financial services group, implemented an enterprise MLOps platform on Amazon SageMaker in just 3.5 months. The project included building CI/CD pipelines, monitoring systems, and governance frameworks, while migrating specific models from external tools. The initiative succeeded in creating a reproducible, auditable ML development environment that gained wide adoption among data science teams by leveraging native AWS tools.

additionalFields.heading: AIM107
additionalFields.title: Data engineering for ML and AI with AWS analytics
additionalFields.body: Micaylin Naidoo, Technical Account Manager, AWS
additionalFields.bodyBack: This session explores how AWS analytics provides complete engineering solutions for ingesting, storing, processing, and integrating data and making the data accessible for generative AI chat assistants and other AI and ML applications.

additionalFields.heading: CH1103
additionalFields.title: Demystifying EC2: The Magic Behind Instance Launch
additionalFields.body: Bianca Haarhof, Senior Manager Software Development, AWS | Francois de Villiers, Principal Software Engineer, AWS
additionalFields.bodyBack: Step inside the engine room of AWS as Cape Town engineers reveal the fascinating mechanics of EC2 instance launches. From the service's origins in South Africa to its evolution into a global powerhouse, discover the hidden complexity, split-second decisions, and sophisticated orchestration that powers millions of launches daily. Get exclusive insights from the team that built and continues to innovate one of AWS's most fundamental services.

additionalFields.heading: COM307
additionalFields.title: Certify with Confidence: Exam Prep Tips & AWS Community Insights
additionalFields.body: Rasheed Mudasiru, Web & Cloud Developer, Bamboo Charcoal Computing
additionalFields.bodyBack: This talk is a practical guide for anyone looking to earn their first (or next) AWS certification—with help from the AWS community. Drawing from personal experience, I’ll outline a 360-degree approach to exam prep: from selecting the right certification to using tools like AWS Skill Builder, the QA Platform, and free tier labs. I’ll also share how the AWS Community Builders program gave me technical mentorship, credits, and access to a global network that kept me accountable and motivated. Attendees will walk away with actionable steps to prep smarter, not harder—and learn how to tap into AWS’s growing support ecosystem.

additionalFields.heading: WS102
additionalFields.title: Streamlined Agent Development with Amazon Bedrock Models and Strands Agents
additionalFields.body: Jarryd Konar, Cloud Support Engineer, AWS | Christian Kamwangala, Specialist Solutions Architect, AWS
additionalFields.bodyBack: Discover how to rapidly build and deploy intelligent AI agents using the powerful combination of Amazon Bedrock and Strands Agents SDK. This hands-on workshop introduces developers to a model-driven approach for creating AI agents that can handle everything from simple interactions to complex multi-agent collaborations. Strands Agents is an open-source SDK that simplifies agent development by connecting two essential components—like the dual strands of DNA—the model and the tools. Participants will learn how to leverage Amazon Bedrock's managed LLM services, including Amazon Nova and Anthropic Claude, to create intelligent agents in just a few lines of code. You will need a laptop to participate.

additionalFields.heading: PTN104
additionalFields.title: Melly AI Fraud Detection
additionalFields.body: Muhideen Adedeji, CTO, Datamellon | Olutimilehin Oyesanya, Group Head, Technology Compliance, Sterling Financial Holdings Company Plc
additionalFields.bodyBack: This is an AI-powered, comprehensive solution designed to protect financial institutions from fraudulent activities through real-time transaction monitoring, advanced analytics, and automated decision-making capabilities. The system provides a suite of APIs that enable banks and financial service providers to integrate sophisticated fraud detection mechanisms into their existing applications.

additionalFields.heading: BIZ103
additionalFields.title: Delivering enhanced customer service and reliability with Amazon Connect
additionalFields.body: Roark Raman, Sr WW Spec Seller Connect | Andrew Baker, Chief Technology Officer, Capitec Bank
additionalFields.bodyBack: This talk embodies Capitec's vision of democratizing premium banking experiences. By turning service challenges into competitive advantages, they're not just solving problems – they're creating new standards for inclusive banking. The rising customer satisfaction scores validate this approach, showing that technology, when properly implemented, can enhance rather than replace the human touch in banking relationships.

additionalFields.heading: GAI103
additionalFields.title: Lead Cloud Operations
additionalFields.body: Alexandre Pinhel, Prototyping Regional Manager, AWS | Alex Shabala, Head of Data Science, Capitec | Hennie Francis, Cloud Engineer III, Capitec
additionalFields.bodyBack: Lead Cloud Operations

additionalFields.heading: PTN207
additionalFields.title: Data to Decisions: Building the GenAI Stack on AWS by CloudZA
additionalFields.body: Jonathan Oaker
additionalFields.bodyBack: The Road Accident Fund (RAF) made a strategic decision to reduce operational and administrative costs while improving claims settlement efficiency through digitization. Their focus on system modernization includes: Implementing an integrated claims management system, Digitizing processes and Enhancing cybersecurity. RAF selected AWS as a key strategic partner to drive their desired outcomes, which among others include focusing settling claims within 120 days.

additionalFields.heading: CH1101
additionalFields.title: Modernisation with AWS Support
additionalFields.body: Nataizya Sikasote, Cloud Support Engineer, AWS | Maureen Barasa, Cloud Support Engineer, AWS | Jenade Moodley, Cloud Support Engineer, AWS
additionalFields.bodyBack: Discover how AWS Support can help guide your cloud modernization journey, whether you are preparing to migrate to the cloud, already using cloud services but looking to optimize performance, or seeking general guidance on your cloud adoption. Organizations often face common challenges during cloud migration and optimization, including complexity of workload migration, security and compliance requirements, cost management, and performance optimization. Learn how AWS Support leverages various processes across different phases of your cloud journey - from initial assessment and planning, through migration and deployment, to ongoing optimisation and operations - ensuring your specific needs are addressed at each stage of cloud adoption.

additionalFields.heading: NET105
additionalFields.title: Adopt AWS operations management culture on your team
additionalFields.body: Hayden Stone, Delivery Manager, AWS | Faadilah Jacobs, Lead - Cloud Operations, Standard Bank
additionalFields.bodyBack: AWS knows that service reliability is something that you rely on. , learn how Amazon has used cultural and technical mechanisms to help teams more effectively operate in a decentralized organization, especially for critical processes like incident management. Dive into the mechanisms and tools that AWS on-call operators use to triage, prioritize, respond to, and mitigate events while exploring how the Amazon culture influences all of these. This talk breaks down and shares the practical methodologies and tools that AWS uses to ensure a low day-to-day ops load and a lower mean time to resolution (MTTR) for incidents.

additionalFields.heading: OIS102
additionalFields.title: Deep Dive into data protection architectures for Amazon Bedrock Agents.
additionalFields.body: Andrew Kane, GenAI Security/Compliance Lead | Onaopemipo Osunyomi, Solutions Architect, AWS
additionalFields.bodyBack: How Amazon Bedrock protects your data across Agents and related features, such as Knowledge Bases and Guardrails. Learn about security considerations for cross-region deployments, multi-agent collaboration, and prompt caching. Gain deep insights into architecting secure generative AI solutions that maintain data protection, and discover architectural patterns that keep your applications safe and secure.

additionalFields.heading: PTN214
additionalFields.title: Fast-track AWS with Vodacom Business & First Distribution
additionalFields.body: Luke Holderness, AWS Alliance Lead, Vodacom Business | Cobus Trauernicht, AWS Brand Manager, First Distribution
additionalFields.bodyBack: Accelerate your AWS journey with Vodacom Business and First Distribution. Learn how this powerful partnership simplifies cloud adoption through local expertise, cost optimisation, and proven AWS strategies like WAF and WAR. Join us to discover how to scale securely, efficiently, and confidently—no matter where you are in your cloud journey.

additionalFields.heading: PTN109
additionalFields.title: Modernise African Governance with GovERP on AWS
additionalFields.body:
Ashley Skippers
14:00 - 14:15
additionalFields.bodyBack: Discover how GovERP, a cloud-based ERP on AWS, transforms public sector efficiency and transparency. Explore use cases from an Education Department, where GovERP streamlined operations, reduced costs, and ensured compliance, driving efficiency, enhancing transparent service delivery, and building public trust to foster sustainable growth and improve African citizens' lives.

additionalFields.heading: CH2306
additionalFields.title: Training ML Models for Content Classification: A SageMaker Journey
additionalFields.body:
Rennay Dorasamy, Senior Cloud Application Architect, AWS | Carl Du Plessis, Solutions Architect, fuseIT | Michael Du Plessis, Solutions Architect, fuseIT
16:00 - 16:45
additionalFields.bodyBack: Join us to explore how we leveraged Amazon SageMaker to analyze social media content at scale. Learn how we built, trained, and compared different ML models - from logistic regression to transformers - to classify content effectively. See real examples of model performance and gain practical insights for your own ML projects. Perfect for data scientists and ML enthusiasts interested in large-scale content analysis.

additionalFields.heading: WS303
additionalFields.title: Boost Developer Productivity with Amazon Q Developer (repeat)
additionalFields.body:
Sizwe Molefe, Solutions Architect, AWS | Abulele Mditshwa, Solutions Architect, AWS
14:15 - 15:30
additionalFields.bodyBack: Discover how AI-powered automation and intelligent code assistance can reduce friction, speed up development cycles, and improve code quality. Learn how to seamlessly integrate these tools into your workflows to boost efficiency, enhance collaboration, and elevate the developer experience—all while ensuring security and compliance. Oluwagbenga Fagbola, Software Engineer Full-Stack/SRE, EvonMedics LLC
14:00 - 14:45

additionalFields.heading: CH2104
additionalFields.title: Demystifying AWS Networking: Ingress, Egress, and Everything In Between
additionalFields.body: Daniel Mutale, Delivery Practice Manager, AWS | Tshepo Keele, Delivery Consultant, AWS | Bubonke Matandela, Delivery Consultant, AWS
additionalFields.bodyBack: This session provides a clear and practical overview of networking in Amazon Web Services (AWS), focusing on how to design and manage secure network architectures within a Landing Zone. We will explore ingress and egress traffic patterns, internet connectivity, Domain Name System (DNS) resolution, and firewall configurations. The session will also cover how to perform traffic inspection and integrate third-party networking and security tools within your AWS environment. With real-world examples and best practices, this session is ideal for cloud architects, security engineers, and platform teams looking to build secure, scalable, and well-governed AWS networking foundations.

additionalFields.heading: DAT201
additionalFields.title: Collaboratively build insightful apps without sharing raw data
additionalFields.body:
Veliswa Boya, Senior Developer Advocate, AWS
09:00 - 09:30
additionalFields.bodyBack: Building modern applications increasingly requires that you complement your data with external raw data from your peers to provide more value to your end users. Access to this raw data isn’t always available due mainly to security reasons. This session and demo shows how AWS Clean Rooms helps you and your peers collaborate on your collective datasets without sharing or copying underlying data.

additionalFields.heading: COM206
additionalFields.title: Supercharge DevOps Automation with Amazon Bedrock and Go
additionalFields.body:
Rasheed Mudasiru, DevOps Engineer at KnowNow Africa Limited
15:00 - 15:45
additionalFields.bodyBack: In this talk, we go through how we can bring AI into our DevOps workflows using Amazon Bedrock and Go. A walk through practical examples of how Bedrock’s foundation models can help us automate things like interpreting designs, troubleshooting, log analysis, and even building smart tools to handle repetitive tasks. We will also look at how you can plug Bedrock into your different DevOps pipelines to make them more intelligent and efficient. If you are a DevOps engineer or Go developer looking to level up your automation with AI without getting deep into machine learning, this session will give you hands-on ideas and code to get started right away.

additionalFields.heading: PTN205
additionalFields.title: Building a Cloud-Smart Workforce
additionalFields.body:
Norman, Hlakudi, Sales Executive, Titan Centre of Excellence
13:00 - 13:15
additionalFields.bodyBack: Discover how organizations can fast-track their AWS cloud adoption through targeted training. This session introduces the AWS Learning Needs Analysis (LNA), a no-cost, data-driven tool that identifies cloud skills gaps and guides up-skilling efforts. Learn how Titan helps teams build cloud capabilities aligned with business outcomes.

additionalFields.heading: WIC102
additionalFields.title: Women in Cloud: A Celebration of Innovation and Cloud Leadership
additionalFields.body:
Melanie McGrory, EMEA Director of Technology, AWS | Jyoti Ball,AWS | Alicia Greenwood,JSE | Michelle Vorster, Goldfields | Mary McDaniel, AWS | Ruth Buscombe-Divey, F1 Analyst and Strategist, F1 Nondumiso Zibi (AWS), Rashika Ramlal (AWS), Melanie McGrory (AWS), Elena Rudenko (AWS) | Mandi Scott, Standard Bank | Alicia Greenwood, JSE
12:00 - 14:30
additionalFields.bodyBack: Time: 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM Speakers : Jyoti Ball (AWS) , Mary McDaniel (AWS), Mandi Scott (Standard Bank), Alicia Greenwood , (JSE), Michelle Vorster (Goldfields) Description: Join this executive panel featuring distinguished women leaders from AWS customer organizations as they share insights on leveraging cloud technology to drive meaningful business transformation. The discussion will explore how women executives are using AWS to create purpose-driven innovations across industries, highlighting successes in AI for Good initiatives and solutions powering Africa's inclusive digital economy. Session 2: Inspiration Beyond Technology Time: 1:00 PM - 1:20 PM Description: Experience an inspiring presentation from Ruth Buscombe-Divey, renowned Formula 1 analyst and strategist, as she shares her journey breaking barriers in a male-dominated field. Ruth will discuss how data-driven decision making and innovative thinking have shaped her career and offer valuable lessons applicable across the technology landscape. Session 3: Executive Insights: Women Leaders Driving Cloud Innovation Time: 1:45 PM - 2:30 PM Description: Following a 30-minute networking break, this panel brings together women executives at the forefront of cloud technology innovation. Panelists will discuss their experiences leading digital transformation initiatives, share strategies for overcoming challenges in the tech industry, and explore how diverse leadership drives more comprehensive and effective technological solutions.

additionalFields.heading: TRN101
additionalFields.title: Develop your Cloud Skills using AWS Skill Builder
additionalFields.body:
Thembelani Sigala Mhlanga, AWS Technical Trainer,AWS
09:00 - 09:45
additionalFields.bodyBack: AWS Skill Builder provides learning options that help you develop, strengthen, and extend your skills on AWS. This session allows you to discover for yourself how to start your learning journey on the AWS cloud. You will discover key elements of the platform such as developed learning plans, labs, digital training content and certification exam preparation sessions, as well as a set of unique features like AWS Cloud Quest or our events gamified learning tools, AWS JAM.

additionalFields.title: Data engineering for ML and AI with AWS analytics

16:00 - 16:45

additionalFields.heading: PTN216
additionalFields.title: AutoXpress: Cloud Migration boosts Business Ops Success
additionalFields.body:
Chumari.wachaga@auxpke.com | Gareth Bowers
15:40 - 15:55
additionalFields.bodyBack: AutoXpress phased cloud migration cut costs through pay-as-you-go pricing and minimized downtime. Post-migration, they achieved near-zero downtime, global accessibility via CloudFront, and improved availability. Scalable infrastructure enhanced operational efficiency, reduced IT overhead, and boosted performance, reliability, and business agility.

additionalFields.heading: DAT202
additionalFields.title: Data foundation for analytics and AI: From data to outcomes at scale
additionalFields.body:
Ademola Sanusi, Solutions Architect, AWS | Tecla Kinoti, Solutions Architect, AWS
09:45 - 10:15
additionalFields.bodyBack: Data decision-makers face a transformative challenge as the boundaries between analytics and AI blur, and teams need to move effortlessly between analyzing historical patterns, predicting future scenarios, and *deploying AI applications.* However, some organizations remain constrained by fragmented workflows, data silos, operational overhead, and limitations of scale and performance. In this session, learn how AWS’s integrated storage, database, and analytics capabilities create a unified, high performance, and secure data foundation where data scientists, analysts, and engineers can collaborate seamlessly across the entire data lifecycle to power analytics and AI outcomes for the business.

additionalFields.heading: OIS303
additionalFields.title: Fireside Chat - Supercharge your innovation: Automate for operational excellence

Terrence Naidoo, SSA SA Lead, Solution Architecture Manager, AWS | Cobus Frey, Group Product Owner – Global Cloud

additionalFields.heading: COM101
additionalFields.title: How AI Is Changing Cybersecurity
additionalFields.body:
Memory Nyathi, Solutions Architect |AAI, Think Tank
09:00 - 09:30
additionalFields.bodyBack: As cyber threats become more sophisticated, artificial intelligence (AI) is transforming the way we detect, investigate, and respond to security incidents. This session explores how AI is reshaping cybersecurity, with a focus on real-world applications using AWS services like Amazon GuardDuty, Inspector, and Detective. Attendees will gain practical insights into how these tools use AI and machine learning to enhance cloud security—and see a live demo that brings it all to life.

additionalFields.heading: WS302
additionalFields.title: Streamlined Agent Development with Amazon Bedrock Models and Strands Agents
additionalFields.body:
Jarryd Konar, Cloud Support Engineer, AWS | Christian Kamwangala, Specialist Solutions Architect, AWS
12:00 - 14:00
additionalFields.bodyBack: Discover how to rapidly build and deploy intelligent AI agents using the powerful combination of Amazon Bedrock and Strands Agents SDK. This hands-on workshop introduces developers to a model-driven approach for creating AI agents that can handle everything from simple interactions to complex multi-agent collaborations. Strands Agents is an open-source SDK that simplifies agent development by connecting two essential components—like the dual strands of DNA—the model and the tools. additionalFields.heading: PTN218
additionalFields.title: Smarter Info Management with OpenText on AWS – Info is the New Currency
additionalFields.body:
Thabiso Hlatshwayo, Sr. Manager, Solutions Consulting, OpenText
16:00 - 16:15
additionalFields.bodyBack: Explore how OpenText on AWS deliver the information advantage through secure cloud innovation. Learn how customers benefit from simplified procurement via AWS Marketplace, access robust infrastructure, modernize their information strategy, and leverage private AI that uses only internal data for real-world impact.

additionalFields.heading: GAI204
additionalFields.title: Unlocking intelligence with Amazon Bedrock & browser automation
additionalFields.body:
Ife Ojomo, Prototype Architect, AWS | Kimessha Paupamah, Delivery Consultant - AI/ML, AWS | Ruan Schutte, Senior Innovation - AI and Projects Specialist, Standard Bank (Liberty)
